name: Armored Warfare – Mercenary Legend Pack
description:
The ultimate Founder’s Pack bundles for mercenary legends who want to start big. Contains the following progression boosts:

- 6.000.000 Credits
- 9,000 Gold
- 90 days of Premium Time
- 45 Loot Crates (15 Silver, 15 Gold and 15 Platinum)

Furthermore, this bundle contains:

- All ICE Premium MBT vehicles
- Three camouflages
- Exclusive Founder’s Pack Commander
- All five Founder’s Pack decals and a Founder’s Pack avatar

But most importantly, Mercenary Legend pack owners will receive early access to Armored Warfare on PS4 – you will be able to start before anyone else. Do not miss this opportunity!

Please note:

- Premium vehicles provide a number of bonuses to their users, including better Matchmaking and improved progression rate
- Premium Time increases your account’s progression rate
- Gold is a premium Armored Warfare currency
- Loot Crates contain in-game boosts, Premium Time and other goodies

Mercenary Legend pack owners will receive early access to Armored Warfare on PS4 – you will be able to start before anyone else. Do not miss this opportunity!

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.
